0: Under the leadership of the noble, yet terribly old-fashioned Kovalev, Otradnoye could not grow into a proper city
7.832973: The protection of Dan’s gang helped the old timers live out their days in peace, but “new blood” never came into the village
17.84177: Ten years have passed, and Otradnoye became nothing more but a legend, scattered by the winds of the Wasteland…
